{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$5.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with WORLD UNIVERSITY SERVICE OF CANADA.

Across 8 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (12%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 8% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$549.1K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 4.71 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$5.5M. The longest contract was 8.21 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$10.9M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [World University Service of Canada](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22World%20University%20Service%20of%20Canada%22)
{{< /details >}}
